title: Antique Medicine / Old Signs
content:
Hello,  
Im looking for any typefaces that might pertain to antique Medicine items as such.  
Anything that looks or feels like any of these would be helpful.  
Thanks  
Jenna

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [drstevens.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531124718/http:/typophile.com/files/drstevens.jpg) | 24.24 KB |
| [37942t.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531124718/http:/typophile.com/files/37942t.jpg) | 71.7 KB |
| [LabeledGargling.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531124718/http:/typophile.com/files/LabeledGargling.jpg) | 47.09 KB |
| [Mullens.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531124718/http:/typophile.com/files/Mullens.jpg) | 75.83 KB |
| [railroad-first-aid-kit.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531124718/http:/typophile.com/files/railroad-first-aid-kit.jpg) | 72.34 KB |
author: jennaarmstrong

comments.content: Take a meander around [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531124718/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/ "Letterhead Fonts") or perhaps a stroll through the [Vintage section](http://web.archive.org/web/20090531124718/http:/new.myfonts.com/tags/Vintage/ "Vintage") of myfonts. I’m sure you’ll find something to your liking.
